content.description: Under which of the following conditions will the procedure NOT return the correct product?
content.question: Select two answers.

choices.label: When the values of and are both positive.
When the values of is positive and the value of is negative.
When the values of is negative and the value of is positive.
When the values of and are both negative.

content.answer: When the values of is positive and the value of is negative.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and correct errors in algorithms and programs, including error discovery through testing.
